channel.title: [delta]Wildy Glitch [rep++]
channel.description:
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2nbsy10.png[/img]
I went into wildy and left and boom, that never leaves.
help me?

item.title: [delta]Wildy Glitch [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

[quote=“Zoft™, post:5, topic:395489”]if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { if (!hasWildySign) { hasWildySign = true; outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("", 199); } int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; if (level != wildyLevel) { wildyLevel = level; sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199); } }[/quote]
Thanks, repped.

Read full topic

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { if (!hasWildySign) { hasWildySign = true; outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("", 199); } int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; if (level != wildyLevel) { wildyLevel = level; sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199); } }

item.title: [delta]Wildy Glitch [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

[quote=“Zoft™, post:3, topic:395489”]Make it in process

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { if (!hasWildySign) { hasWildySign = true; outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("", 199); } int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; if (level != wildyLevel && !isInWarZone()) { wildyLevel = level; sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199); } }[/quote]
Worked but 1 thing.

Compiling... .\client.java:22572: cannot find symbol symbol : method isInWarZone() location: class client if (level != wildyLevel && !isInWarZone()) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: [delta]Wildy Glitch [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Make it in process

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { if (!hasWildySign) { hasWildySign = true; outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("", 199); } int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; if (level != wildyLevel && !isInWarZone()) { wildyLevel = level; sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [delta]Wildy Glitch [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Can you still attack other people?
If not , it’s just so that walkable wildy interface isn’t de-loading when you step out of the wild , simply add an else statement for when the player is not in wild and return a -1 walkable interface

Read full topic
